segments.text: I hope I get an easy question like you did .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You rolled a four . Let's see ... you landed on Foreign Films .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , great . That's just my luck ! I hate those arty movies .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , too bad . So , what foreign film won an Oscar in 1993 ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , please ! I have no idea .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The answer is Belle Opaque . It's a Spanish movie , and the title means The Age of Beauty in English .
segments.speaker: S1
